subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Mike Modano’s 507th goal, extending his record for players born in the United States, sent the Dallas Stars to a 3-2 victory over the visiting Chicago Blackhawks yesterday.
snippet: Mike Modano’s 507th goal, extending his record for players born in the United States, sent the Dallas Stars to a 3-2 victory over the visiting Chicago Blackhawks yesterday.
